manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The O Naturals African Black Soap Bar 3- Piece Set was designed for the skin. African Black Soap is known for several things. It is known first for its intensive healing properties. It’s perfect for use as an anti-aging facial wash. It can also reduce skin discoloration and will relieve dry patches and irritation while deeply cleansing each pore. O Naturals then infused Olive Oil, Dead Sea Mud, and Lavender to make it truly unique. * These vegan soap bars are made with organic ingredients, All Natural, Cruelty-free, Sulfate-free, and Paraben-free. * O Naturals Soaps use sustainable Palm Oil only!

About O Naturals O Naturals is about natural living inside and out. We bring a variety of natural and organic skincare products to you from the Hemp Collection, Dead Sea Salt Scrubs, Bar Soaps, and more. O Naturals takes pride in using natural and organic ingredients in our products. African Black Soap A Cleansing Superstar Plantain Peels: These Bananas are a major source of antioxidants, protein, folic acid, thiamine, riboflavin, potassium, and Vitamin CCocoa Pods: These are rich in antioxidants and have strong anti-inflammatory properties.Coconut Oil: This beauty cleans and moisturizes the skin. It also is known to encourage collagen production.Shea Butter: For silky smooth skin, Shea Butter softens and moisturizes dry skin.Dead Sea Mud: To help exfoliate away the dead skin, leaving your skin smooth and bright.

Our African Black Soap Heal Your Skin African Black Soap is known first for its intensive healing properties. It’s perfect for use as an anti-aging facial wash. It can also reduce skin discoloration and will relieve dry patches and irritation while deeply cleansing each pore. Fight Off the Toughest Cases of Acne African Black Soap deeply cleanses each pore on the skin. This is where acne starts as dead skin cells and oil build up in the pores. Additionally, African Black Soap has natural properties that prevent the spread of oil and other build-up in the pores from spreading, preventing the spread of a single pimple turning into many. The O Naturals Touch O Naturals infused several premium natural ingredients into this luxury soap bar: Olive Oil gives your skin maximum moisturization.Dead Sea Mud exfoliates away the dead skin that was drawn out of the pores.Lavender leaves your skin feeling relaxed after a good cleaning.

O Naturals French Triple Milled Soap Bars Milling is what thoroughly mixes the soap and any fragrances or extra ingredients added to the soap base, while squeezing out any extra moisture or air. Triple Milled Soaps contain less water and more actual soap creating a long-lasting hard soap. Our French Triple Milled Soaps are Designed with authentic, all natural and organic ingredients that will leave your face and body feeling cleansed, hydrated, moisturized and lux. Additionally, O Naturals Soap bars are beneficial for all skin types, Cold-Pressed, Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, cruelty-free, and PH Balanced.

How to Maximize the Use of Your Soap Bar Prepare Your Soap Begin by cutting your soap into halves or thirds. Put the pieces into a soap bag so that you can scrub with them. Storing Your Soap Store your soap in a soap dish drain off water and let it dry. Place it as far away as possible from the shower head. Use a Loofah or Washcloth Using a loofah or washcloth uses less soap than scrubbing by hand while producing a more luxurious lather. Take Cooler Showers Take cooler showers as the hot water has a harder time creating lather. This means your soap bar lasts longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for keeping skin soft and moisturized during the winter months.
reviews.reviewText: I really love this soap because it lathers nicely and really moisturizes your skin over the winter. It is not greasy, has no heavy scent to it, and rinses off nicely even in soft water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. The soap is easy on my skin and leaves it feeling soft and moist. I am trying to get away from products that come in plastic and this fits the bill for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I'll keep using as my everyday bar soap
reviews.reviewText: I've bough three times, great for work as the smell is mild. I like how it leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth and doesn't dry out my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pleasant smell, and it leaves you feeling clean afterwards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The soap bars are super small and they don’t lather well. One bar only lasted me and my husband a week before I had to open another one, but being that they’re natural products, they kinda just melt away i guess. I was done with all three bars in less than a month and it’s not like I’m taking hour showers. It has no smell. If you have sensitive skin, this is ideal, but if you like to smell good just know you won’t get it with this soap alone, you’ll have to use a fragrance. The soap saver is great, exfoliates well if you like a good scrub. I use it with whatever bar soap I’m using. I’d buy it again to replace the soap saver, lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seems to dry my skin which is why I use it. Best soap ive used next to tar type soaps which have a really bad odor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soap that doesn’t irritate skin
reviews.reviewText: Love how smooth and silky it leaves my skin. I am very sensitive to bars of soap but this definitely is worth to buy. I absolutely love it! I have no problems with it and my skin doesn’t turn red or burn so I highly recommend it for sensitive skin folks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and Refreshing
reviews.reviewText: I really like and enjoy using this product. The soap lathers nicely and my skin feels refreshed after using it. Most of all the scent is something my wife really appreciates.

reviews.reviewTitle: Jabones muy cremosos e hidratantes. Olor agradable a coco.
reviews.reviewText: Jabón muy cremoso e hidratante. Ideal para pieles secas o atópicas. Tiene un suave y ligero aroma a coco que personalmente me resulta muy agradable. Como pega, por ponerle alguna, es que estos jabones son un poco más pequeños que los convencionales, y por tanto, se gastan más rápido pero por el precio que tienen, tampoco se puede pedir más. Sin duda, volvería a comprarlos. Muy satisfecha y los recomiendo a todo el mundo.

Als jemand mit empfindlicher Haut hat die Suche nach einer geeigneten Seife stets eine Hürde dargestellt. Herkömmliche Seifen und Duschgele setzen mich häufig lästigen Reizungen und Juckreiz aus, was die kontinuierliche Herausforderung bei der Suche nach einem passenden Produkt bedeutet.• Diese Seife hinterließ meine Haut spürbar glatt mit einem dezenten matten Effekt. Ich schätzte die Abwesenheit von Irritationen oder Juckreiz, die bei anderen Produkten oft ein Anliegen sind.• Der Duft der Seife ist angenehm und schlägt eine gute Balance, die weder schwer noch überwältigend ist.✅ Vorteile:🟢 Sanft zu empfindlicher Haut🟢 Angenehmer Duft🟢 Vielseitige Verwendung❌ Nachteile:🔴 KeineFür Personen mit empfindlicher Haut, die eine Seife suchen, die ausgezeichnete Ergebnisse liefert, ohne Unannehmlichkeiten zu verursachen, ist diese Seife eine Überlegung wert. Sie erledigt die Arbeit ohne Schnickschnack und bietet eine großartige Option für die tägliche Reinigung.

Als jemand mit empfindlicher Haut war es eine wiederkehrende Herausforderung, eine geeignete Seife zu finden. Traditionelle Seifen und Duschgele haben mich oft mit lästigen Irritationen und Juckreiz zurückgelassen, was die Suche nach einem geeigneten Produkt zu einer Herausforderung machte.• Was diese Seife auszeichnet, ist ihre Fähigkeit zu reinigen, ohne die üblichen Probleme zu verursachen.Ich kann nichts über den Schlamm oder den Tongehalt in dieser Seife sagen, aber die Ergebnisse sind klar: Nach Verwendung dieser Seife fühlt sich meine Haut glatt an, mit einem schönen matten Effekt, und es gibt eine spürbare Abwesenheit von Reizungen oder Juckreiz.• Ihr Duft ist angenehm und nicht schwer oder überwältigend.✅ Vorteile:🟢 Sanft zu empfindlicher Haut🟢 Angenehmer Duft🟢 Vielseitige Verwendung❌ Nachteile:🔴 KeineFür Personen mit empfindlicher Haut, die eine Seife suchen, die ausgezeichnete Ergebnisse liefert, ohne Unannehmlichkeiten zu verursachen, ist diese Seife eine Überlegung wert. Sie erledigt die Arbeit ohne Schnickschnack und bietet eine großartige Option für die tägliche Reinigung.

Despues de probar varios geles y champoos comerciales y algunos especificos.. Me recomendaron probar este jabon y la verdad que he quedado sorprendido y maravillado.. me funciona mucho mejor que los anteriormente mencionado, me ha mejorado mucho la piel de la cara(tengo dermatitis) y de la cabeza. Recomiendo que lo prueben y lo usen. No se arrepentiran.
